All these changes seem interesting coming as a player who has never really played her. So can't comment on how former fans will think of this, but one thing that perplexes me and annoys me tbh is the heal in the ultimate! What the hell does hitting all hit points of your enemy has to do with being able to heal all your allies?
How stupid and random is that? 
Remove the heal and the ultimate is fair, or if it feels lacking simply add a cc effect to the ulti calling it something like demoralization.

i.e. Once Fiora manages to hit all 4 weak points of an enemy, any remaining enemies in that zone get demoralized and loses some attack speed or movement speed for a short time. 
And ultimate that does massive damage and heals your party is just ridiculous. I mean what does that do to healers like Janna and Soraka?


"...Fiora creates **a large and long-lasting zone** under her enemy that heals Fiora and her allied champions. "

I think you are right with the heal being out of place. I really think that having an AoE fear would be better since it would make sense for people to be afraid of what she has just done dismantling someone. Like in any fight when you just dismantle someone the rest of the goons just run away in fear.
I agree, as much as the heal seems nice, what does this have to do with who fiora is? is she some magical combat-medic now? doesn't seem to fit with her character.

i think the point was to change it up, say if you had a support like leona with no heals, fiora becomes a viable pick for the teamplay. also thin k of it the other way, instead of demoralizing the enemy, why wouldn't her presence raise the morale of friendlies? there's already enough cc on the rift.

Well even in the case of it being that she raises morale, 
surely it would still only make sense for a boost to be combat related(eg:Sivir's ultimate).
Sivir rallies her allies with a call and gives them movement boost. Given that Fiora is a duelist, it would be fitting if she raised ally attack speed.

It will be interesting to see how the gameplay changes pan out and as a Fiora player I like what you're trying to do. One small point however; what on Gods green earth have you done to her visuals!? she's gone from a rougeish fencing master to looking like something you dredged up from World of Warcrafts reject pile {{champion:114}} with the face of Cruella de vil...

With regards to character looks, I have to say that the older character design was far far better than this new design. The older design had so much character, where as her new face is so generic and bland.
Fiora had this really cool bratty and intimidating look to her which is completely absent in this new design. Don't get me wrong, it's still great art but it's trying to fix something that wasn't broken.
